author: kirin
install_msg: UnicornDocs loaded! Use `[p]docs config apikey` to set up your OpenRouter API key.
name: unicorn-docs
description: AI-powered documentation question and answer system for moderation team. Uses RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) with ChromaDB and OpenRouter API.
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores vector embeddings of documentation content for AI-powered question answering. No personal user data is stored.
